creator: sean.mullan@oracle.com
text:
The javax.xml.crypto.dom.DOMCryptoContext.setIdAttributeNS method is used
to register ID attributes so xmldsig can find them. This works fine when
generating signatures, but not when validating them.

A workaround is to use the DOM Element.setIdAttribute method, if using DOM L3. Or
you can use the XMLSec IdResolver.registerElementById method.
